thread.title: UK Government launches national campaign to end mental health stigma
thread.title_full: UK Government launches national campaign to end mental health stigma - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: UK Government launches national campaign to end mental health stigma
text: A new government campaign aimed at reducing the stigma around mental health is to be launched, ministers have announced. The scheme, which will target young people, will make sure of social media and school visits and see a new information website set up. Ministers claim the campaign will be the largest ever of its kind. Read more
